name: Call Tracking (Django) oxifork
description: Call Tracking in Django with Twilio oxifork

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account secret ID, you can find at: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your secret Twilio Auth token, you can find at: https://www.twilio.com/user/account

TWIML_APPLICATION_SID.description: The secret ID for a TwiML Application you'll use with this app. Create one here: https://www.twilio.com/user/account/apps/add

DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE.description: Instructs our app to use the production settings module

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A unique, unpredictable key for your Django app
